content.body: re modelling early errors as an SDO: I've thought about it. I agree w bakkot that it wouldn't be particularly helpful to readers, as most early error rules are about as clear as they need to be for most people's purposes. On the other hand, there are some dark corners of early error processing, and the exercise might shine some light on them.
